Regulation Name(s): Creatine Phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PATHFAST cTnI-II test, calibrators, and sample diluent for quantitative cardiac troponin I measurement in whole blood or plasma using chemiluminescent immunoassay on the PATHFAST instrument
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for quantitative measurement of cardiac Troponin I in heparinized or EDTA whole blood and plasma as an aid in diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction, for use in clinical laboratory or point of care settings
